projects.title: WEB APP
projects.description: A simple general web app built using Node.js is a versatile platform designed to serve various purposes. It leverages the power of Node.js to handle server-side operations

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: A simple video playing app is a straightforward application that allows users to effortlessly view video content. It features a clean and intuitive user interface, making it easy to navigate through a library of videos.

projects.title: CryptoHUB
projects.description: A simple crypto app with a user-friendly platform designed to facilitate cryptocurrency-related functionalities. It features an intuitive interface, allowing users to easily navigate through the crypto world.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: The simple React e-commerce app is a user-friendly online platform designed to facilitate seamless shopping experiences. The app also includes a robust search and filtering system.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: A portfolio app with a visually appealing platform designed to showcase an individual's work in a compelling and organized manner. It features a clean, aesthetically pleasing user interface
